data.title: E-Media and Digital Content
data.meta_description:
We offer free access to digital books, music, movies, courses and more! To access content from our world-class e-media providers:

Click on any provider below.
Enter your library card number and PIN  (or create an account, if required).
Search their site to stream or download content!


Don't have a library card?
data.text:
We offer free access to digital books, music, movies, courses and more! To access content from our world-class e-media providers:

Click on any provider below.

Enter your library card number and PIN (or create an account, if required).

Search their site to stream or download content!

Don't have a library card? Get an e-card to instantly enjoy digital content!

Quick Links (Top Providers)

E-BOOKS & AUDIOBOOKS (view all providers)

Libby

hoopla

MUSIC & PODCASTS (view all providers)

Freegal

Aloud

hoopla

Wall Street Journal

LANGUAGE LEARNING (view all providers)

Mango

Transparent Language

Cell-Ed

Digital Content Collections

LAPL has specially curated free digital books, videos and tutoring providers for many of our patrons, including:

CHILDREN STUDENTS JOB SEEKERS EN ESPAÑOL

Free E-media Providers

Click the provider links below for full descriptions, links to help and contacts, mobile apps and a direct link to the provider's content site.

E-BOOKS, AUDIOBOOKS & COMICS

LIBBY | OVERDRIVE E-BOOKS • AUDIOBOOKS • MAGAZINES • CHILDREN'S • MULTILINGUAL

Libby is an innovative in-browser and mobile app from OverDrive designed to make borrowing and enjoying e-books, magazines, streaming services and audiobooks from the library easier than ever. Libby is available on your browser and for Android and iOS devices.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

BIBLIOBOARD E-BOOKS • AUDIOBOOKS • COMICS & GRAPHIC NOVELS • CHILDREN'S

BiblioBoard features books, articles, images, photographs, maps, pamphlets, and documents as well as streaming audio and video content on a wide variety of topics including Literature, History, Philosophy, Religion, Science, Nature, Native American Studies, Sports, Drama, Games, Crafts, Cooking, Music and Children's Literature. Local Author Collection : This collection represents the best independently published titles submitted by local Los Angeles authors to the SELF-e program, as selected by staff at Library Journal magazine. All content is available on an unlimited multi-user basis with no checkouts or returns. You can access BiblioBoard content from the web or various mobile devices using your library card number. Download the free app using these links: Web, iPad, Nexus, Kindle Fire HD Just choose "Los Angeles Public Library" from the Library Credentials drop down, then enter your library card # and pin.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

DIGITALIA PUBLIC LIBRARY E-BOOKS

Digitalia Public Library offers Spanish language e-books that can be read online or downloaded to devices, as well as language courses for Spanish, English, and "Quick Languages", a course in simple words and phrases in 12 languages. Also offers multimedia sections with art, music and PC instruction.

HELP

TRAVEL EBOOK COLLECTION E-BOOKS

Travel E-book Collection offers over 300 Premier Travel Reference e-books that include DK Eyewitness Travel Guides and Rough Guides to Countries and Cities. These e-books can be translated into a number of different languages and sections downloaded to your electronic device.

SIMPLYE E-BOOKS

SimplyE is an e-reader app that makes it easier to browse, borrow and read library e-books. The app brings most of our e-book collections together in one place, including titles from Overdrive, enki, and Biblioboard. SimplyE also offers access to public domain and openly-licensed books through the SimplyE Collection, and Open Bookshelf.

hoopla E-BOOKS • AUDIOBOOKS • COMICS

hoopla is a digital media platform that gives access to digital entertainment content from either mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets and/or via any browser. hoopla offers e-books, e-comics, full length feature movies, episodic television programming, full musical albums and unabridged audiobooks. *You will be prompted to create a user account the first time you access this provider's content.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

COMICS PLUS E-BOOKS • COMICS & GRAPHIC NOVELS

Comics Plus offers unlimited access to thousands of digital comics, graphic novels, and manga from a variety of library-friendly publishers. Patrons use their library card to download items.

MOBILE APPS:

Top

MOVIES, TV & VIDEOS

DIGITALIA FILM MOVIES • MULTILINGUAL

Digitalia Film Library offers streaming films available to watch online, mostly foreign language but also has some classic American cinema. Includes feature films as well as documentaries. Choose the language icon up top to view the site in Spanish.

LA IN FOCUS VIDEOS OTHER VIDEO

LA in Focus Videos is a series of lectures presented by Photo Friends and the Photo Collection of the Los Angeles Public Library, spotlighting images from the Library's collection and unique stories of L.A. history.

BIBLIOBOARD OTHER VIDEOS

BiblioBoard features books, articles, images, photographs, maps, pamphlets, and documents as well as streaming audio and video content on a wide variety of topics including Literature, History, Philosophy, Religion, Science, Nature, Native American Studies, Sports, Drama, Games, Crafts, Cooking, Music and Children's Literature. Local Author Collection : This collection represents the best independently published titles submitted by local Los Angeles authors to the SELF-e program, as selected by staff at Library Journal magazine. All content is available on an unlimited multi-user basis with no checkouts or returns. You can access BiblioBoard content from the web or various mobile devices using your library card number. Download the free app using these links: Web, iPad, Nexus, Kindle Fire HD Just choose "Los Angeles Public Library" from the Library Credentials drop down, then enter your library card # and pin.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

hoopla MOVIES • TV • OTHER VIDEO

hoopla is a digital media platform that gives access to digital entertainment content from either mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets and/or via any browser. hoopla offers e-books, e-comics, full length feature movies, episodic television programming, full musical albums and unabridged audiobooks. *You will be prompted to create a user account the first time you access this provider's content.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

KANOPY MOVIES

Kanopy is a video streaming platform with one of the largest collections in the world (five times that of Netflix), with over 30,000 feature films and documentaries and featuring over 1,000 producers and distributors, including Criterion Collection, Kino Lorber, BBC, and more.

HELP

CONTACT

medici.tv VIDEOS

medici.tv is the world’s leading classical music channel with on-demand streaming. It boasts a catalog of over 1,800 videos including concerts, ballets, operas, documentaries, master classes, behind-the-scenes footage, and artist interviews. Each year, a selection of exclusive events are broadcast live from the world’s most prestigious concert halls, opera houses, festivals, and competitions at medici.tv. Replays are available on-demand after the event.

HELP

CONTACT

Top

MUSIC & PODCASTS

FREEGAL MUSIC • MUSIC VIDEOS

Freegal allows users to download up to 5 music track downloads a week from the Sony Music catalog. All selections are DRM-free in mp3 format. Patrons use their library card to download items.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

BIBLIOBOARD MUSIC • MUSIC VIDEOS

BiblioBoard features books, articles, images, photographs, maps, pamphlets, and documents as well as streaming audio and video content on a wide variety of topics including Literature, History, Philosophy, Religion, Science, Nature, Native American Studies, Sports, Drama, Games, Crafts, Cooking, Music and Children's Literature. Local Author Collection : This collection represents the best independently published titles submitted by local Los Angeles authors to the SELF-e program, as selected by staff at Library Journal magazine. All content is available on an unlimited multi-user basis with no checkouts or returns. You can access BiblioBoard content from the web or various mobile devices using your library card number. Download the free app using these links: Web, iPad, Nexus, Kindle Fire HD Just choose "Los Angeles Public Library" from the Library Credentials drop down, then enter your library card # and pin.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

ALOUD PODCASTS

Aloud podcasts are recorded live in Los Angeles Central Library's Mark Taper Auditorium as part of the award-winning ALOUD at Central Library speaker series presented by the Library Foundation of Los Angeles.

MOBILE APPS:

CAREER CONVERSATIONS PODCASTS

Career Conversations is a series presented by Teen'Scape. Teens and adults are able to listen to guests discuss their chosen career and the path it took to get there. These relaxed conversations are a great insight into your dream career.

MOBILE APPS:

hoopla MUSIC

hoopla is a digital media platform that gives access to digital entertainment content from either mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets and/or via any browser. hoopla offers e-books, e-comics, full length feature movies, episodic television programming, full musical albums and unabridged audiobooks. *You will be prompted to create a user account the first time you access this provider's content.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

Top

NEWSPAPERS & MAGAZINES

NY TIMES DIGITAL NEWSPAPERS

NY Times Digital offers access to the New York Times digital site. You must create an account for access. From remote computers: Click “Register” to create an account with your personal email address, or “Sign In” if you already have created an account. From in-library computers: Click on "Log In" and then either sign in or use the link at the bottom to create an account. *You will be prompted to create a user account the first time you access this provider's content.

HELP

GUIDE (PDF)

MOBILE APPS:

WALL STREET JOURNAL NEWSPAPERS

Your library card gives you access to unlimited Wall Street Journal articles and a digital version of the daily paper. Click here to create your account. Your access will be available for the next 3 days. At the conclusion of the 3-day period you may click the above link again to renew your access by logging in as an existing user with the same username and password you originally created. If you are using a library computer you will not need to sign in or create an account.

WASHINGTON POST NEWSPAPERS

Your library card gives you 7 days of complimentary, unlimited access to the digital edition of The Washington Post. For new users, enter the required fields to create a Washington Post account. For returning users, sign in with your existing Washington Post account. If you are using a library computer you will not need to sign in or create an account. After 7 days you may reactivate your free library access by logging in again at this specific link.

SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA NEWS GROUP NEWSPAPERS

The Los Angeles Public Library provides free online access to newspaper titles from the Southern California News Group.

LIBBY | OVERDRIVE E-BOOKS • AUDIOBOOKS • MAGAZINES • CHILDREN'S • MULTILINGUAL

Libby is an innovative in-browser and mobile app from OverDrive designed to make borrowing and enjoying e-books, magazines, streaming services and audiobooks from the library easier than ever. Libby is available on your browser and for Android and iOS devices.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

BIBLIOBOARD MAGAZINES

BiblioBoard features books, articles, images, photographs, maps, pamphlets, and documents as well as streaming audio and video content on a wide variety of topics including Literature, History, Philosophy, Religion, Science, Nature, Native American Studies, Sports, Drama, Games, Crafts, Cooking, Music and Children's Literature. Local Author Collection : This collection represents the best independently published titles submitted by local Los Angeles authors to the SELF-e program, as selected by staff at Library Journal magazine. All content is available on an unlimited multi-user basis with no checkouts or returns. You can access BiblioBoard content from the web or various mobile devices using your library card number. Download the free app using these links: Web, iPad, Nexus, Kindle Fire HD Just choose "Los Angeles Public Library" from the Library Credentials drop down, then enter your library card # and pin.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

PRESSREADER NEWSPAPERS • MAGAZINES

PressDisplay by PressReader offers instant access to 2000 plus newspapers from 100 countries in 60 languages languages (use their menu to select your preferred reading language). In addition to being able to read them online, users who install the PressReader app on their mobile device, and connect through any Branch Library wi-fi, can download papers for offline reading without subscribing. For the website, click on Sign In and then select the library card option (not necessary at library computers). After you sign in with your card, you can finish creating an account that can be used on the app. You will need to sign into the site every few days to keep the app account active.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

LAPL DATABASES HISTORICAL PERIODICALS

Los Angeles Public Library's Research and Homework Databases are an extensive collection of newspaper and magazine archives, professional and trade associations and certifications, science and technology resources, cultural and genealogical exploration tools, visual art repositories, legal and business reference databases and substantially more.

MOAZINE KOREAN LANGUAGE MAGAZINES

Moazine is a Korean language E-magazine platform that provides access to more than 215 Korean language magazines in politics, economics, lifestyle, fashion, travel, sports, etc Download or read on-line on any electronic device with internet access.

HYREAD MAGAZINES • MULTILINGUAL

With HyRead you can access Chinese language e-magazines on a variety of topics including current events, science, technology, beauty, health, and many more. HyRead提供各種電子雜誌：如時事，科學，技術，美容，健康等。

MOBILE APPS:

Top

ONLINE LEARNING & INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEOS

GALE COURSES GENERAL • CAREER

Gale Courses offers a wide range of highly interactive online courses. All of the courses are free, and led by expert instructors. Courses run for six weeks and new sessions begin every month. Subjects offered are Career and Professional, Computers and Technology, Personal Development and Writing and Publishing.*These courses have been designed for learners over 13 years of age.

HELP

LINKEDIN LEARNING GENERAL • CAREER • COMPUTERS

is an award-winning online learning site taught by recognized industry experts, offering more than 3,000 courses and 150,000 videos on business, technical and creative skills. When using the LinkedIn Learning app the Library ID to enter is LAPL.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

CRAFTSY CRAFTS • EDUCATION

Craftsy is an online resource for all creative makers that includes over 3,000 hours of diverse video instruction for patrons that are just getting started or looking for advanced techniques.

DIGITALLEARN.ORG CAREER • COMPUTERS

DigitalLearn.org offers computer basics videos. If you are new to computers or want to learn how to send an e-mail, search the Internet, etc. *You will be prompted to create a user account the first time you access this provider's content.

UNIVERSAL CLASS CAREER • ACADEMICS

Universal Class Over 500 online non-credit Continuing Education Courses. These courses are led by expert instructors and are provided for your personal enrichment. Business, Career Training, Cooking, Real Estate, Crafts and Hobbies and Psychology are a few of the subjects covered by these courses. *These courses have been designed for learners over 13 years of age.

HELP

CONTACT

LEARNINGEXPRESS LIBRARY CAREER • ACADEMICS

LearningExpress Library offers online interactive practice exams covering adult basic, academic, job related, civil service and more. Now includes ESL Spanish Basic Skills Course.

HELP

SCIENCEFLIX ACADEMICS

ScienceFlix combines curriculum-driven, leveled content, interactive features, and intuitive navigation into a single, highly-engaging digital resource for students in grades 4 through 9. ScienceFlix is available for use on PCs, Macs and most tablets and mobile devices

HELP

TESTING & EDUCATION REFERENCE CENTER ACADEMICS

Testing & Education Reference Center offers over 300 practice tests and courses, information on over 4,000 accredited schools, e-books containing study materials and practice tests, scholarship search, resume builder, and career modules with subjects from career change to salary negotiations.

HELP

Top

LANGUAGE LEARNING & ESL

MANGO LANGUAGES LANGUAGE LEARNING

Mango Languages offers free, online language learning in languages that include Spanish, French, Italian, Chinese (Mandarin and Cantonese), Arabic, Korean, Russian, Tagalog, Greek, Latin and more. Mango has English language courses for speakers of 19 different languages, including Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, and Russian. Learn on the go with the Mango Mobile app for iPhone and Android. *You will be prompted to create a user account the first time you access this provider's content.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

DIGITALIA PUBLIC LIBRARY LANGUAGE LEARNING • ESL

Digitalia Public Library offers Spanish language e-books that can be read online or downloaded to devices, as well as language courses for Spanish, English, and "Quick Languages", a course in simple words and phrases in 12 languages. Also offers multimedia sections with art, music and PC instruction.

HELP

TUMBLEBOOK LIBRARY LANGUAGE LEARNING • CHILDREN'S

Tumblebook Library is an online collection of animated, talking picture books which teach young children the joys of reading in a format they'll love.

HELP

TRANSPARENT LANGUAGE ONLINE LANGUAGE LEARNING • ESL

Available in 110+ languages, including ESL, Transparent Language Online gives learners the flexibility they need to learn a new language anytime, anywhere.

Support

LEARNINGEXPRESS LIBRARY ESL

LearningExpress Library offers online interactive practice exams covering adult basic, academic, job related, civil service and more. Now includes ESL Spanish Basic Skills Course.

HELP

UNIVERSAL CLASS ESL

Universal Class Over 500 online non-credit Continuing Education Courses. These courses are led by expert instructors and are provided for your personal enrichment. Business, Career Training, Cooking, Real Estate, Crafts and Hobbies and Psychology are a few of the subjects covered by these courses. *These courses have been designed for learners over 13 years of age.

HELP

¡LEAMOS! ESL

¡Leamos! (Let's Read) is a simple and easy-to-use pre-ESL online literacy course that teaches non-literate Spanish-speaking adults to read and write in Spanish. Contact Adult Literacy at 213-228-7037 to join our tutoring program and have access to this offering. *You will be prompted to create a user account the first time you access this provider's content.

HELP

CELL-ED ESL

Cell-Ed mobile program allows you to learn English anywhere, anytime, by using your cell phone. You need unlimited minutes and texting. It’s very easy and free for students. Just dial this number: (213) 223-7330 and provide the pin code 5275. For further information call (213) 228-7037.

HELP

Top

CHILDREN'S

LIBBY | OVERDRIVE E-BOOKS

Libby is an innovative in-browser and mobile app from OverDrive designed to make borrowing and enjoying e-books, magazines, streaming services and audiobooks from the library easier than ever. Libby is available on your browser and for Android and iOS devices.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

BIBLIOBOARD E-BOOKS

BiblioBoard features books, articles, images, photographs, maps, pamphlets, and documents as well as streaming audio and video content on a wide variety of topics including Literature, History, Philosophy, Religion, Science, Nature, Native American Studies, Sports, Drama, Games, Crafts, Cooking, Music and Children's Literature. Local Author Collection : This collection represents the best independently published titles submitted by local Los Angeles authors to the SELF-e program, as selected by staff at Library Journal magazine. All content is available on an unlimited multi-user basis with no checkouts or returns. You can access BiblioBoard content from the web or various mobile devices using your library card number. Download the free app using these links: Web, iPad, Nexus, Kindle Fire HD Just choose "Los Angeles Public Library" from the Library Credentials drop down, then enter your library card # and pin.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

BOOKFLIX E-BOOKS

BookFlix lets kids read, watch and listen to books and book videos! This fun Scholastic website reinforces reading skills for early readers, reluctant readers and English language learners for grades preK-3.

HELP

TUMBLEBOOK LIBRARY E-BOOKS • LANGUAGE LEARNING

Tumblebook Library is an online collection of animated, talking picture books which teach young children the joys of reading in a format they'll love.

HELP

hoopla MUSIC

hoopla is a digital media platform that gives access to digital entertainment content from either mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets and/or via any browser. hoopla offers e-books, e-comics, full length feature movies, episodic television programming, full musical albums and unabridged audiobooks.*You will be prompted to create a user account the first time you access this partner's content.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

MAKEMAKE E-BOOKS

MakeMake es una plataforma de libros digitales, interactivos y animados que ofrece acceso a una colección de literatura infantil y juvenil única, proveniente de América Latina. En MakeMake encontrarás más de 300 cuentos ilustrados, historietas, novelas, mitos y leyendas para lectores desde los 3 años en adelante.

Top

STUDENTS

HELPNOW TUTORING & HOMEWORK HELP TUTORING & HOMEWORK HELP

Brainfuse HelpNow offers K-12 students and adults free, on-demand, academic tutoring in English, math, science, social studies, writing, and world languages (ESL, Spanish, Tagalog, Cantonese, Mandarin, Vietnamese) 24 hours a day, 7 days a week (except major holidays). Tutoring is available in English, Spanish, Mandarin, Cantonese, Tagalog, and Vietnamese. HelpNow also offers expert assistance filling out the Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA®), a diagnostic test center for ACT/SAT, GRE/HiSET, and AP test prep with customized study plans, lessons, videos, and practice tests, and private virtual study rooms.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

TUTOR.COM (LIVE HOMEWORK HELP) TUTORING & HOMEWORK HELP

Tutor.com (Live Homework Help) offers free one-on-one online homework help provided by expert tutors from 11 a.m. - 11 p.m. every day. Provides assistance in English & Spanish for students in grades K-12, college intro and adult learners covering Math, Science, English, Social Studies, and Proof Point (writing review). The SkillsCenter Resource Library, available 24/7, offers worksheets, tutorials, study guides, plus an Adult Education and Career Center!*You will be prompted to create a user account the first time you access this partner's content.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

TESTING & EDUCATION REFERENCE CENTER ONLINE LEARNING & INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEOS

Testing & Education Reference Center offers over 300 practice tests and courses, information on over 4,000 accredited schools, e-books containing study materials and practice tests, scholarship search, resume builder, and career modules with subjects from career change to salary negotiations.

HELP

SCIENCEFLIX ONLINE LEARNING & INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEOS

ScienceFlix combines curriculum-driven, leveled content, interactive features, and intuitive navigation into a single, highly-engaging digital resource for students in grades 4 through 9. ScienceFlix is available for use on PCs, Macs and most tablets and mobile devices

HELP

LAPL DATABASES DATABASES • DOCUMENTS • ART/IMAGES • HISTORICAL PERIODICALS

Los Angeles Public Library's Research and Homework Databases are an extensive collection of newspaper and magazine archives, professional and trade associations and certifications, science and technology resources, cultural and genealogical exploration tools, visual art repositories, legal and business reference databases and substantially more.

JOB SEEKERS

TESTING & EDUCATION REFERENCE CENTER ONLINE LEARNING & INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEOS

Testing & Education Reference Center offers over 300 practice tests and courses, information on over 4,000 accredited schools, e-books containing study materials and practice tests, scholarship search, resume builder, and career modules with subjects from career change to salary negotiations.

>

HELP

GALE COURSES ONLINE LEARNING & INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEOS

Gale Courses offers a wide range of highly interactive online courses. All of the courses are free, and led by expert instructors. Courses run for six weeks and new sessions begin every month. Subjects offered are Career and Professional, Computers and Technology, Personal Development and Writing and Publishing.*These courses have been designed for learners over 13 years of age.

HELP

LinkedIn Learning ONLINE LEARNING & INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEOS

is an award-winning online learning site taught by recognized industry experts, offering more than 3,000 courses and 150,000 videos on business, technical and creative skills.

HELP

MOBILE APPS:

DIGITALLEARN.ORG ONLINE LEARNING & INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEOS

DigitalLearn.org offers computer basics videos. If you are new to computers or want to learn how to send an e-mail, search the Internet, etc. *You will be prompted to create a user account the first time you access this provider's content.

LEARNINGEXPRESS LIBRARY ONLINE LEARNING & INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEOS

LearningExpress Library offers online interactive practice exams covering adult basic, academic, job related, civil service and more. Now includes ESL Spanish Basic Skills Course.

HELP

Top

EN ESPAÑOL

LIBBY | OVERDRIVE LIBROS ELECTRÓNICOS • REVISTAS

Libby es una aplicación innovadora disponible en el navegador y en tu móvil designada para que el préstamo de libros electrónicos, revistas, servicios de streaming y audiolibros de la biblioteca sea más fácil que nunca. Libby está disponible en tu navegador y en dispositivos Android y iOS.

AYUDA

CONTÁCTENOS

CELULAR:

DIGITALIA PUBLIC LIBRARY LIBROS ELECTRÓNICOS • APRENDIZAJE EN LÍNEA • ESL

Digitalia Public Library ofrece libros electrónicos en español para descargar o leer en línea, así como cursos para aprender inglés, español y otros idiomas. Además ofrece una sección multimedia con arte, música, cuentos infantiles y cursos de computación.

AYUDA

PRESSREADER PERIÓDICOS • REVISTAS

PressReader ofrece acceso a más de 4000 periódicos de 100 países en 60 lenguas.

AYUDA

CELULAR:

NY TIMES DIGITAL PERIÓDICOS

DIGITALIA FILM PELÍCULAS

Digitalia Film Library ofrece una cuidada y variada selección de películas para ver en línea y de forma instantánea. Incluye películas y documentales en lenguas extranjeras y clásicos del cine americano.

FREEGAL MÚSICA • VIDEOS MUSICALES

Freegal —con su tarjeta de la biblioteca puede descargar gratis hasta cinco canciones por semana en formato mp3. Las canciones forman parte del catálogo de Sony Music y están libres de DRM (derechos digitales).

AYUDA

CELULAR:

MANGO LANGUAGES APRENDIZAJE DE IDIOMAS • ESL

Mango Languages —recurso interactivo en línea para el aprendizaje de idiomas que incluye lecciones para aprender español, francés, italiano, chino, árabe, coreano, ruso, filipino, griego y latín, entre otros.

AYUDA

CELULAR:

MAKEMAKE LIBROS ELECTRÓNICOS • NIÑOS

MakeMake es una plataforma de libros digitales, interactivos y animados que ofrece acceso a una colección de literatura infantil y juvenil única, proveniente de América Latina. En MakeMake encontrarás más de 300 cuentos ilustrados, historietas, novelas, mitos y leyendas para lectores desde los 3 años en adelante.

GALE COURSES APRENDIZAJE EN LÍNEA • ESL

Gale Courses ofrece más de 300 clases en línea impartidas por instructores expertos en cada tema. Los temas incluyen contabilidad, finanzas, administración de negocios, preparación para los estudios superiores, programas de computadora, diseño gráfico, cuidado de la salud, ESL (inglés como segundo idioma), artes, leyes, desarrollo personal, educación y tecnología. Todos los cursos son impartidos en inglés y tienen una duración de seis semanas.

AYUDA

UNIVERSAL CLASS APRENDIZAJE EN LÍNEA • ESL

Universal Class ofrece más de 500 cursos de educación continuada para el enriquecimiento personal de los estudiantes. Las clases son impartidas en inglés por instructores expertos en cada tema. Los temas incluyen administración de negocios, capacitación técnica, cocina, bienes raíces, manualidades, cuidado de animales y mascotas, medicina alternativa, computadoras y tecnología, desarrollo de sitios web, jardinería, psicología, entre otros.

AYUDA

LEARNINGEXPRESS LIBRARY APRENDIZAJE EN LÍNEA • ESL

LearningExpress Library es una excelente herramienta para estudiantes de todas las edades que ofrece exámenes de práctica, ejercicios, cursos, libros electrónicos e información para ayudar a los usuarios a alcanzar sus objetivos en los estudios y en el trabajo. Ofrece una sección diseñada especialmente para hispanohablantes que incluye preparación para el GED y prácticas para mejorar las habilidades matemáticas y de lectura y escritura.

AYUDA

¡LEAMOS! ESL

¡Leamos! es un curso en línea fácil de usar que enseña a adultos hispanohablantes a leer y escribir en español.

AYUDA

CELL-ED ESL

Con Cell-Ed, tu teléfono celular se convierte en tu maestro. Incluye un programa con seis niveles de inglés de nivel básico a avanzado

AYUDA
